name: Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather)
description: A field in Manufacturing and processing that covers the manufacture of textiles, textile and leather products, clothing, shoes, and other footwear. It focuses on the industrial production aspects.

name: Clothing trades
description: Skilled professions involved in the design, cutting, sewing, and finishing of garments, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Dressmaking
description: The craft of making dresses and other garments, often with a focus on custom fitting and design, part of Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Footwear making
description: The design and construction of shoes and other footwear, a specialized trade in Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Fur making
description: The trade of processing and crafting garments and accessories from animal furs, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Garment production
description: The industrial processes involved in manufacturing clothing on a large scale, a key aspect of Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Leather processing
description: The transformation of raw animal hides and skins into leather through tanning and other treatments, part of Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Saddlery
description: The craft of making saddles and other equipment for horses, typically from leather, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Shoemaking
description: Synonymous with 'Footwear making', referring to the craft and industry of producing shoes, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Skins and leather production
description: The processes involved in obtaining and preparing animal skins and transforming them into leather for various uses, part of Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Spinning
description: The process of twisting fibers together to create yarn or thread for textile production, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Tailoring
description: The art and trade of designing, cutting, fitting, and finishing clothes, especially suits and coats, often to individual measurements, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Textile trades
description: Encompasses various skilled professions related to the production and processing of textiles and textile products, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Upholstery
description: The craft of providing furniture, especially seats, with padding, springs, webbing, and fabric or leather covers, a trade within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Weaving (industrial)
description: The large-scale manufacturing of fabric by interlacing threads or yarns on looms, distinct from craft weaving, part of Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).

name: Wool science
description: The study of wool fibers, their properties, processing, and use in textile manufacturing, within Textiles (clothes, footwear and leather).
